Because lymphedema may develop many years after infection, lab tests are most likely to be negative with these patients.",CDC,Parasites - Lymphatic Filariasis
What are the treatments for Parasites - Lymphatic Filariasis ?,"Patients currently infected with the parasite
    
Diethylcarbamazine (DEC) is the drug of choice in the United States. The drug kills the microfilaria and some of the adult worms. DEC has been used world-
